Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source

Class DatasetSource

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.AbstractSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.DatasetSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSource, QueryableDataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileSource
public class DatasetSource extends AbstractSource
A class for making FHIR data with Spark datasets available for query.
Author:
John Grimes, Piotr Szul

  • Field Details

    • resourceMap

      @Nonnull protected Map<String,Dataset<Row>> resourceMap
      A map of resource codes to their corresponding datasets. The key is the resource code, and the value is the dataset containing the resource data.

  • Method Details

    • dataset

      public DatasetSource dataset(@Nullable String resourceType, @Nullable Dataset<Row> dataset)
      Add a dataset to this source.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the resource code
      dataset - the dataset
      Returns:
      this data source, for chaining

      Description copied from interface: DataSource
      Gets the dataset for the specified FHIR resource type.
      Parameters:
      resourceCode - the code for the FHIR resource type
      Returns:
      the dataset with the resource data

    • getResourceTypes

      @Nonnull public Set<String> getResourceTypes()
      Returns:
      the set of resources that are available through this data source

    • map

      @Nonnull public QueryableDataSource map(@Nonnull UnaryOperator<Dataset<Row>> operator)
      Description copied from interface: QueryableDataSource
      Applies a transformation to each dataset within this data source.
      Parameters:
      operator - the transformation to apply
      Returns:
      a new DataSource containing the transformed datasets

    • cache

      public QueryableDataSource cache()
      Description copied from interface: QueryableDataSource
      Caches the datasets in this data source to improve performance for subsequent queries.
      Returns:
      a new DataSource with cached datasets
